author: Wright
text: The country with the most educated and gifted people in Africa and arguably the most stupid people. Because tell me how else you can explain the morons we elect and allow to rule us. Just tell me how it happens.  #PeterObi4President

author: Wright
text: Every Nigerian knows that Peter Obi will make Nigeria work. They know this very well but Nigerians love instant gratification, one that cannot be sustained like a loaf of bread with Tinubu’s face on the wrapper or a keg of kerosene with ikpeazu’s.  #PeterObi4President

author: Wright
text: Nigerians, Suffer never do? If you like go and accept bags of rice and oil that would last for 2 weeks and then suffer for the next 8 years again. If you were 18yrs old when APC took office, you’ll be 26 when Buhari leaves and 34 if you elect a fool. #PeterObi4President

author: Wright
text: If the @OfficialPDPNig knows what is good for them and if they care about the survival of their party and indeed the entity called Nigeria, they shouldn’t look beyond Peter Obi. I know mago-mago is in a lot of their DNA but they have to do it right for once #PeterObi4President

author: Wright
text: We really don’t care. They predicted that dead bodies will litter the streets of Africa due to the pandemic but to their dismay, God fought for Africa.
